name: Rowing with TRX band
how_to_perform:
1. Begin by standing facing a wall or stable anchor point, securing the TRX band to your back at shoulder height.
2. Step forward with one foot and secure the other end of the TRX band under this leg, wrapping it around your ankle for support.
3. Bend over slightly while keeping your arms straight, holding onto the top of the TRX band frame with both hands.
4. Take a step backward with your working foot to create tension in the TRX band and maintain proper posture throughout the whole body.
5. Row towards yourself by pulling on the TRX band frame with both hands whilst contracting your core.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, reversing sides.
short_summary: Rowing with a TRX band is an upper back exercise targeting latissimus muscles and works several secondary muscle groups in the torso.
